channel.title: freebsd on The Second Draft
channel.description: Recent content in freebsd on The Second Draft

item.title: FreeBSD on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: I’m a FreeBSD guy. My first computer was a FreeBSD machine that my dad had running in a closet. I learned how to use Emacs as well as the command line on that black-screen white-text no-mouse interface. That’s how real programmers spend their childhood! ðŸ˜Ž ðŸ˜œ I’ve only heard good things about FreeBSD. While not known as particularly desktop-friendly (various Linux distros win here) I’ve heard tales of its rock-solid stability.
